general.tapOrChooseToUpload: Tap or choose file to upload

message.invalidInput: Please fill all required fields correctly (Age, Height, Weight, and Gender).

home.title: Know your Heart Health
home.subtitle: You might not get a second chance
home.shortDesc: 1 million patients 250+ cardiologists & AI Backed

auth.loginTitle: Enter your phone number to login
auth.loginSubTitle: An OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number for verification.
auth.dontRiskLifeForCoffeePrice: Don’t risk your life for the price of a coffee

question.q01: Tell us your gender, age, height, and weight
question.q0101: Have you had any surgery on your uterus?
question.q0102: At what age did you have the surgery?
question.q02: Is stress affecting work or relationship?
question.q03: Are you getting adequate sleep every night ?
question.q04: How active are you in your daily life?
question.q05: Do you currently smoke or have you smoked in the past 10 years?
question.q0501a01: About 10 cigarettes daily for over 10 years
question.q06: Has any of your parents or siblings been diagnosed with heart disease in the last 10 years?
question.q06Sub: Add if you have more siblings with heart ailments.
question.q0601: What was their age at the time of diagnosis?
question.q07: Has any of your uncles, aunts, or cousins from your fathers or mothers side been diagnosed with heart disease in the last 10 years?
question.q07Sub: Add if you have more family members with heart ailments.
question.q0901: How long have you been identified with diabetes?
question.q10: Do you have High Blood Pressure or Hypertension?
question.q1001: How long do you have Hypertension?
question.q11: Are you undergoing any dialysis for kidney related ailment?

risk.calculateScore: We’re calculating your score, please wait
risk.lowRiskMsg1: Even though with low risk, heart issues can stay hidden
risk.lowRiskMsg2: Your BMI is high, raising health concerns
risk.lowRiskMsg3: We suggest regular exercise for a better you
risk.lowRiskMsg4: Low risk detected. CT angiogram optional to rule out hidden risk
risk.lowRiskMsg5: We would recommend that you get yourself a Blood Monitor
risk.lowRiskMsg6: Your LDL levels are borderline. We recommend tracking them monthly for the next 6–9 months
risk.highRiskFactors3: You have a family history of heart attack.

report.trackActivities: You can track your activities here

userProfile.takeBloodTestAndUploadResults: For higher accuracy, take a blood test and upload the results
userProfile.getBloodTestImmediatelyAndUpload: Get a blood test immediately and upload your reports
userProfile.bloodTestAnalyzed: Your blood test is being analyzed by the doctor
userProfile.bloodTestResultsOut: Your blood test results are out
